org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.common

Class PropertyMappingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.store.cassandra.common.PropertyMappingHelper

  • public class PropertyMappingHelper
extends Object
    Helper class providing bunch of methods to discover fields of POJO objects and map builtin Java types to appropriate Cassandra types.

    • Constructor Summary

      PropertyMappingHelper()

      • getPojoPropertyDescriptors

        public static List<PropertyDescriptor> getPojoPropertyDescriptors(Class clazz,
                                                  boolean primitive)
        Extracts all property descriptors from a class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class which property descriptors should be extracted.
        primitive - boolean flag indicating that only property descriptors for primitive properties should be extracted.
        Returns:
        list of class property descriptors

      • getPojoPropertyDescriptors

        public static <T extends Annotation> List<PropertyDescriptor> getPojoPropertyDescriptors(Class clazz,
                                                                         Class<T> annotation,
                                                                         boolean primitive)
        Extracts all property descriptors having specific annotation from a class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class which property descriptors should be extracted.
        annotation - annotation to look for.
        primitive - boolean flag indicating that only property descriptors for primitive properties should be extracted.
        Returns:
        list of class property descriptors

      • isPrimitivePropertyDescriptor

        public static boolean isPrimitivePropertyDescriptor(PropertyDescriptor desc)
        Checks if property descriptor describes primitive property (int, boolean, long and etc.)
        Parameters:
        desc - property descriptor.
        Returns:
        true property is primitive

      • getCassandraColumnValue

        public static Object getCassandraColumnValue(com.datastax.driver.core.Row row,
                             String col,
                             Class clazz,
                             Serializer serializer)
        Returns value of specific column in the row returned by CQL statement.
        Parameters:
        row - row returned by CQL statement.
        col - column name.
        clazz - java class to which column value should be casted.
        serializer - serializer to use if column stores BLOB otherwise could be null.
        Returns:
        row column value.
